casebody.data:
State ex rel. Bristow
v.
Baxter 2018-0172 Supreme Court of Ohio. May 23, 2018

CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

In Mandamus. On amended motion to designate relator a vexatious litigator pursuant to S.Ct. Prac.R. 4.03. Motion denied.

O'Donnell, Fischer, and DeGenaro, JJ., dissent.
